response:
Right-limb dysmetria, dysdiadochokinesia, gait ataxia and rebound nystagmus localise to the ipsilateral cerebellar hemisphere. Reduced left visual acuity with a left RAPD localises to the left optic nerve. Normal strength, tone and reflexes argue against pyramidal or peripheral lesions.

lesion_locations = ["Right Cerebellar Hemisphere", "Left Optic Nerve"]
